com.ephesoft.dcma.kvextraction.service

Interface KVExtractionService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    KVExtractionServiceImpl

    public interface KVExtractionService
    This service is used to extract the data from scanned pages using key value extraction and insert the received data as a document level fields to the batch.xml file. Data will be added to the document level fields. If the more than one data is found then values are added to the alternate value of document level fields.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Ephesoft
    See Also:
    KVExtractionServiceImpl
